channel.title: Making a Cookbook on Dave's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Making a Cookbook on Dave's Notebook

item.title: Recipes in R
item.description: I haven’t used much R Markdown before. I briefly played about with it for producing self reporting models, but the transport consulting world likes what it likes. ⊕ and what they like is excel models and word reports I haven’t had the time to explore further. So this writing site is my main experiment area for R Markdown. I’m going to look into an R Markdown solution for my recipes problem.
